archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.4.7d: d) demonstrates how information, gathered during reconnaissance, could be used by attackers (e.g. identity theft; creating fake passports, fake accounts or credit cards; or online scams)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
